question: My boyfriend of  10 years is a type 1 diabetic, he has had high blood pressure, fluctuating sugars throughout his life, suffers from neuropathy, chronic pain in his back, he recently received a kidney transplant, he is on the list for a pancreas transplant, he suffers from gastroparesis, he lost his vision a year ago due to his diabetes, i have met people similiar to him and they have restored their vision, can anyone help me begin where i can find help for his vision. Despite his medical issues i still love him and i am willing to help him anyway possible. Can anyone help me?
title: Help my blind fiance
